name: Roots N Bugs (GGJ 2023)
description:
Help your tree roots reach the water at the bottom while protecting them from bugs using symbiotic mushrooms!

Every turn you have to open 1 event card on the board, and then place cards from your hand on the open spots on the board, and then you end your turn.

You win when have formed a chain of cards from top to bottom! You lose when a bug reaches the top of your roots. 

Controls:

- Right click to pan around the board (touchpad: drag with two fingers)

- Zoom out with mouse wheel (touchpad: pinch with two fingers)

Credits:

Art - Ivette
Programming - Barbara
Programming - Marcel
Tech Art/Programming - Kotob
Sound & Music - Alec Shea
